DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Iso-Osmolar Ipo-Osmolar Contrast Agents Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction ( AMI ) Undergoing Primary Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI )
DOC.detailed_description: This multicentric randomized comparison iso-osmolar ipo-osmolar contrast agent patient treat primary PCI evaluation contrast-induced nephropathy incidence myocardial tissue reperfusion . The study design non-inferiority trial .
